title: Attach Merchant Center
description: Schema for linking a Google Merchant Center feed to a Performance Max campaign

account_id.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no dashes)

campaign_resource_name.description: Full campaign resource name (alternative to campaign_id)

feed_label.description: Optional feed label to filter products from Merchant Center

sales_country.description: Country code for the feed (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

asset_group_id.description: Specific asset group ID to link the feed to (optional, will use default if not provided)

replace_existing.description: Replace existing Merchant Center link if one exists
